html:
5.5.17  1:22 pm   You have made 394 videos for YouTube so far. Are you satisfied?

     they weren't necessarily made for youtube, but i posted them there because youtube is a common and popular site

5.5.17  1:02 pm   What is important?

     the ground

5.5.17  12:54 pm   Is truth relative, or a matter of opinion?

     the real truth is the size of the entire universe. so any time you want to fit truth into one sentence, you're basically gonna have to make it up

5.5.17  12:50 pm   Do you mind personal questions, e.g. questions about you, or do you prefer questions about things you're doing?

     i try to just deal with whatever questions people ask. that's part of the fun of this page

5.5.17  12:48 pm   What do you write lyrics about? And what inspires your lyrics?

     the world i live in

5.5.17  12:41 pm   Will you go salsa dancing with me?

     i would prefer to be the one making the salsa

5.5.17  12:21 pm   We've been at this for almost a year Bill. The shareholders are angry and are getting close to pulling out of the deal. Where the fuck is my fucking video?

     which one is yours

5.5.17  11:59 am   Which would you choose, $1 now, or $1.50 a month from now?

     $1.50 a month from now

5.5.17  11:55 am   Do you expect to see comments like, 'this video should've only taken 30 hours tops' again?

     no, i expect to not look at the types of pages that may have those types of comments. and if someone sends me something like that through the questions page, i might press the caps lock key
5.5.17  11:28 am   will you make more jingles and random things after hotewig?

5.5.17  11:23 am   what do you like to use to block out the haters?

     a force field

5.5.17  11:12 am   what's something you only recently discovered about yourself?

     i might actually finish this project i've been working on since last summer

5.5.17  11:09 am   did u ever make a reality video for when u were making HOTEWIG because i would really like to see the artistic process that u put into it

      i have been recording journals every day just as i have for the last 7 years. making those journals into videos, as usual, will get kicked down the road until whenever it's a good time to put my entire career on hold

5.5.17  10:56 am   what stage are you on making the video?

     making final adjustments and making sure everything is ok

      are you almost finished on that stage?

     i can't tell you

5.5.17  10:44 am   Would you ever do a interview so your audience can really know who you are or are you just too shy? i'm curious

     i have answered probably over 20,000 questions here. if you read this entire site, you will probably know me extremely well although you won't know what i eat for lunch i am sorry about that

5.5.17  10:31 am   thoughts on going to the cinema alone?

     ah, very professional

      have you done that before?

     yes

5.5.17  10:30 am   do you feel like these questions don't do enough to stimulate you intellectually?

     the main way this page stimulates me is spirtually

5.5.17  10:04 am   why express ideas in your art that you don't necessarily agree with/believe in?

     perhaps to add some variety, and intrigue

5.5.17  9:30 am   wouldn't it be funny if you just didn't release this new video, and kept it all to yourself?

     normally that would seem counter productive but i am starting to consider it
5.5.17  8:33 am   what is your favorite instrument?

5.5.17  8:23 am   have you considered making another deadline to give yourself a final boost similar to the one in december? or would that trick no longer work

     right now i don't really need a boost because i am so close to finishing the project. the important thing now is that i make sure everything's ok

5.5.17  8:09 am   Can we except the alphabet shuffle to come to your website along HoTEWIG?

     i think so

5.5.17  7:41 am   Whoa bill, is the stress of the project getting to you? I've never seen you use all caps before

     it has always been a valuable tool, in my repertoire

5.5.17  7:24 am   do you draw strength from being alone?

     only because it gives me time and space to focus, and work

5.5.17  7:21 am   why does everybody and their uncle's iguana want you to do collaborations

     i don't know

5.5.17  6:35 am   who let the dogs out?

     the dogs were originally out. i think the more important question is who put the dogs in confinement, in the first place

5.5.17  5:39 am   is becoming weaker sometimes better than becoming stronger? i noticed that when i had cancer. my boss always told be i was being so tough and so strong, but i didn't feel like that at all. i felt like water, just flowing. i just let the cancer happen, there was no fight. and i think that was the right thing to do (becoming weaker instead of stronger) bc i recovered pretty fast from it and had no big trauma's or anything. but i also think it depends from situation to situation if being stronger or weaker or staying the same is better.

     ah, i agree. if the word 'weak' seems too negative, i think 'peace' is what you are talking about

5.5.17  5:08 am   can you explain gravity

     gravity is usually what explains other things

5.5.17  4:51 am   What exactly prompts you to answer a question in all uppercase such as "THE PROJECT IS NOT DELAYED I HAVE BEEN WORKING ON IT EVERY DAY AS FAST AS I CAN FOR THE LAST 323 DAYS BUT I RESPECT YOUR OPINION"?

     each item of white text on this page is prompted by the purple text that comes immediately above it

      Are you literally yelling at your keyboard while typing it out? Are you trying to convey an angry feeling in your answer or is it just for emphasis?

     i pressed the caps lock button, which makes the letters a bit larger. i thought the reason for doing this was clear given the context of the situation, and i thought i explained it clearly

5.5.17  4:34 am   I think people get annoyed because you say "very small things", so they assume it will take 5 minutes

     i've been working on this thing for 10 and a half months, i kind of want to make sure it's all set

5.5.17  4:23 am   maybe you should just keep the video for yourself and not release it since people are so annoying

     you know i never thought about doing that but i am starting to consider it
5.5.17  3:49 am   Will there ever be another history video? I love your japan one, along with like 25 million other people.

5.5.17  3:35 am   What do you recommend I study for my APWH test (May 11th)

     i have no idea, i don't know what's on the test

     PS ILL PAY YOU LIKE 20$ TO GET THE VID UP BY MAY 11th like you don't have to no pressure but just a lik incentive ;)

     i will finish it as fast as possible, regardless of how much money you give me

5.5.17  2:22 am   when people ask two things with a question mark like "sky or ground?" they mean do you prefer one or the other like tits or ass

     oh, ok. well even so, it's an impossible question. everything exists and i'm glad

5.5.17  2:14 am   Is it wrong that the biggest reason I'm looking forward to this video being out is to see what comes afterwards?

     oh, too real

5.5.17  2:11 am   do you sometimes feel whelmed? not overwhelmed, not underwhelmed, just... whelmed.

     oh hell yeah

5.5.17  1:43 am   are you a mechanical pencil kind of guy

     yes

5.5.17  1:33 am   Would you agree that basic income would be chaotic for a large country such as China or the US and would be better implemented in a country with a small population for the current global economy

     i never thought of it that way but you might be right

5.5.17  1:27 am   Is the new list of things to do for HOTEWIG bigger or smaller than the last one?

     smaller

5.5.17  1:21 am   How do you determine which questions you answer? Do you randomly pick from a horrible mix of awful questions with a few good ones or do you hand pick the good ones? Are there criteria that we could refer to so your general question pool is of a higher quality?

5.5.17  12:44 am   Is there anything your new video you wanted to add but lacked the skill to do so?

     yes, and then i learned to do it anyway

5.5.17  12:42 am   do you remember the lyrics to all of your songs by heart?

     no, especially not the ones that haven't been recorded

5.5.17  12:36 am   when you fix big problems does it create smaller problems

     sometimes

5.5.17  12:31 am   I think email is the greatest advancement in professional communication to this day. Do you have feelings about email?

     yes i think it's good

5.4.17  11:50 pm   Will we see you post a video on youtube anytime soon?

     yes
5.4.17  11:41 pm   how do i ask questions? this is something that has been bugging me for a long time. Can you tell me how?

5.4.17  11:34 pm   your recent capital-letter explosions are scaring me

     if you think capital letters are scary, wait til you see what's going on in syria

5.4.17  10:52 pm   do i get points for trying?

     trying what

5.4.17  10:37 pm   WHAT ARE YOUR KINKS

     talent

5.4.17  10:34 pm   3x37 = 112, did you know that

     it is not, but i respect your opinion
